ygData.subject: Re: Shiny Brass Halbrid
ygData.msgSnippet: I did find a short list that attempts to put prices on the most commonly sold items, at least on the Mith Marr server anyway.  It has been rather helpful in
ygData.messageBody:
I did find a short list that attempts to put prices on the most
commonly sold items, at least on the Mith Marr server anyway. It has
been rather helpful in not getting ripped off on certain items I've
bought, and also in making sure I'm not getting ripped off when
selling too hehe

If anyone wants to know the URL, let me know and I can post it here or
email it to you so others don't have the temptation to peek!

On Fri, 6 Aug 1999 16:04:03 -0400, you wrote:

>From: "Keith G. Spencer" <kgs@...>
>
>100-125p
>
>The more I think about it, I think someone needs to set out a full out price
>scale of items for everyone to use at least as a reference. I'm
>consistantly annoyed to see people trying to oversell items to people who
>just don't have a feel for what an item is worth.

--

Saldara
High Elf Wizard (20), Mith Marr server

Melaniel
Wood Elf Bard (9), Mith Marr server
